urls.title: Immigration Stories
urls.description: ​ If you are an immigrant, a descendant of immigrants, an ally or if your life has been touch in a positive way by Immigration and you want to share your story in front of a live audience, even if...

text:
@WhiteHouse I thought @realDonaldTrump said the number of causalities due to his inept handling of the #covid19 was going to be Zero.
I don't remember @POTUS saying the number of death would be 1 followed by a bunch of zeros

#Resist #CancelTrump #TrumpLiesPeopleDie 

https://t.co/WC5xmh40iA

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
